False

Correct ! Hogwarts awaits your arrival !!
Uh oh. Something\'s wrong ! Try Mischief Managed
This is the 1st question !
1. Just after Harry Potter\'s parents died at the hands of Lord Voldemort, Harry was sent to live at Hogwarts School of Witchcraft and Wizardry.
2. Ron and George Weasley are twins.
3. Sirius Black, Harry\'s godfather, is an Animagus and can turn into a big black dog.
4. In Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets, after many painful rejections, Nearly-Headless Nick is FINALLY allowed in to the Headless Hunt.
5. The cry of a fully grown Mandrake can kill you.
6. The Dursleys live at 4 Privet Drive.
7. Harry Potter\'s wand happens to be the brother (equivalent) of Albus Dumbledore\'s wand.
8. The title of the first Harry Potter book is different in England from the name it has in the US.
9. Since Harry Potter is the star of his house Quidditch team, it\'s pretty obvious that Harry grew up in a family that was ADDICTED to watching (and playing) Quidditch.
10. Professor Dumbledore does not like Bertie Bott\'s Every Flavor Beans.
11. The First Character To Die In The Deathly Hallows Part 1 Was Dobby
12. Neville Longbottom\'s Greatest Fear Is Snape
13. Harry Potter\'s Middle Name Is James
14. Igor Karkaroff Put Harry\'s Name In The Goblet Of Fire
15. Hermione\'s First Boyfriend Was Cedric Diggory
16. Snape\'s Patronus Is A Doe
17. Dumbledore\'s Phoenix Is Called Fawkes
18. The Basilisk Was One Of Voldermort\'s Horcruxes
19. Ron\'s Brother Charlie Married Fleur Delacour
20. Norbert Was Hagrid\'s Pet Hippogriff
